name: dashboard_grock_test
summary: nội dung về dashboard và grok
description: Gdashboard đã được lọc ra các trường như ip, user,...

description.@value: IP ssh thành công trong 10 phút
Số user đăng nhập trong 10 phút
IP ssh thất bại trong 10 phút
Số lần ssh thành công trong 10 phút
Số lần ssh thất bại trong 10 phút

regex_value.@value: pam_unix\(sshd:session\): session opened for user (.*?) by
postfix/.*: hostname (.*) does not resolve to address .*

title.@value: Postfix: Block: Host has no reverse DNS

grok_pattern.@value: postfix.*: to=<%{EMAILADDRESS:mailto}>, relay=%{DATA:relay}, delay=%{DATA:delay}, delays=%{DATA:delays}, dsn=%{DATA:dsn}, status=%{DATA:status} %{GREEDYDATA:satus_details}
dovecot: imap-login: Login: user=<%{DATA:user}>, method=%{DATA:method}, rip=%{IP:rip}, lip=%{IP:lip}, mpid=%{NUMBER:mpid}, TLS, session=<%{DATA:session}>
%{WORD:source} sshd\[%{INT}\]: %{WORD:acction} password for invalid user %{WORD:User_ssh} from %{IPV4:IP_ssh} port %{INT:Port_ssh}
%{WORD:acction} password for invalid user %{WORD:User_ssh} from %{IPV4:IP_ssh} port %{INT:Port_ssh}

default_template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["192.168.1.1:5044"]
path:
  data: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\cache\filebeat\data
  logs: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\logs
tags:
 - windows
filebeat.inputs:
  type: log
  enabled: true
  paths:
    - C:\logs\log.log

# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

filebeat.inputs:
- input_type: log
  paths:
    - /var/log/*.log
  type: log
output.logstash:
   hosts: ["192.168.161.60:5044"]
path:
  data: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat/data
  logs: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat/log

template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

filebeat.inputs:
- input_type: log
  paths:
    - /var/log/*.log
  type: log
output.logstash:
   hosts: ["192.168.161.60:5044"]
path:
  data: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat/data
  logs: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat/log
